text: I have traveled through time from the year 2118 specifically to answer your questions today. Since I already know what happens, I will answer your questions before you even ask. AMA

I am the voice of Boo from Monsters Inc, AMA


proof on my instagram: @yoga\_boo 

\<3

looking forward to answering questions.

I was a child sex slave for the first 11 years of my life AMA


From when I was a baby till 11 I was physically and emotionally abused. I was told everyday that I was worthless and that I deserved to die. I was tortured, sold for sex and threatened to be killed if I refused. I wasn't a son to my first family, I was an asset to make them money. It took almost 17 years of therapy, self in social behavior and self worth, and refusal to be a victim to recover and get where I am now.
Today, 2018-04-18, my pet rock died after severe complications. AMA

I am teaching english to Buddhist Monks in Cambodia. Tomorrow I will be recording a podcast for Life is Weird with 8 of my teenage students. Ask me questions to ask them concerning Buddhism, monkhood, and Cambodia, a country where 1/3 of their population was killed in 1960â€™s by the Khmer Rouge.
I work in a supermarket in Colorado and I constantly see customers get lost while high AMA

I host orgies, Ask Me Anything


I host orgies at my home. We've had as many as 15 people.  Ask me anything.
My on and off girlfriend of 6 years was convinced by her ex husband to break up with me just as I was getting ready to propose. AMA.
